meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of May 13, 2024 Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Public Safety Recruiting and Retention Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the recruitment and retention efforts for public safety personnel.
agenda_items.presenter: Israel Herrera, Deputy Chief, Personnel & Training Division, Dallas Police Department

agenda_items.title: Violent Crime Reduction Plan Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the strategies and effectiveness of the violent crime reduction plan.
agenda_items.presenter: Jason Scoggins, Major of Police, Dallas Police Department

agenda_items.title: First Responder Street Topper Update
agenda_items.description: Presentation on the updates regarding the First Responder Street Topper initiative.
agenda_items.presenter: Stephen Williams, Major, Dallas Police Department

agenda_items.title: Office of Integrated Public Safety Solutions Dashboard Demonstration
agenda_items.description: Demonstration of the dashboard for the Office of Integrated Public Safety Solutions.
agenda_items.presenter: Kevin Oden, Director, Office of Integrated Public Safety Solutions

agenda_items.title: FY25 Budget Overviews
agenda_items.description: Overview of the budget for FY25 related to public safety.
agenda_items.presenter: Justin Ball, Fire Chief (I), Dallas Police Department

agenda_items.title: Legislative Priorities- Public Safety
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the legislative priorities concerning public safety.
agenda_items.presenter: Clifford Sparks, Manager- Legal, City Attorney’s Office

agenda_items.title: Public Safety Dashboards
agenda_items.description: Presentation on the public safety dashboards.
agenda_items.presenter: Dominique Artis, Chief of Public Safety, City Manager’s Office

agenda_items.title: Dallas Fire-Rescue Facility Construction Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the construction of Dallas Fire-Rescue facilities.
agenda_items.presenter: Justin Ball, Fire Chief (I), Dallas Fire-Rescue Department

agenda_items.title: Dallas Fire-Rescue Fleet Maintenance Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the maintenance of the Dallas Fire-Rescue fleet.
agenda_items.presenter: Justin Ball, Fire Chief (I), Dallas Fire-Rescue Department

agenda_items.title: Authorize a Memorandum of Understanding with the United States Capitol Police
agenda_items.description: Authorize an MOU for reimbursement for support provided by Dallas Police and Fire Rescue.

agenda_items.title: Authorize a three-year master agreement for emergency road flares
agenda_items.description: Authorize a master agreement for the purchase of emergency road flares.

financial_items.description: Reimbursement for support and enhancements provided by the Dallas Police Department and Dallas Fire Rescue for Congressional events.
Purchase of emergency road flares for the Police Department and Fire-Rescue Department.
